headline: Is It Time To Reassess Altria After Its Multi Year Share Price Rebound?
summary: If you are wondering whether Altria Group is still a cash rich, undervalued dividend giant or if the easy money has already been made, this breakdown will help you consider whether MO still deserves a place in your portfolio. Despite a slight dip of 1.0% over the last week, the stock is up 1.0% over 30 days, 11.9% year to date and 17.9% over the past year, with longer term gains of 57.6% over 3 years and 109.1% over 5 years reshaping the risk reward picture.
